title: VALORANT YOUTUBER EDITOR
job_overview:
BEFORE YOU APPLY
NO BASIC EDITING 
1. have fast efficiency on rotobrush/masking editing
2. Do not apply if you have only basic editing/ and your portfolio is only tiktok shorts with ugc
3. MUST PLAY VALORANT and understand the game fully to edit it

About Us

Making a big splash in the valorant gaming scene to bring something fresh into the scene in terms of long form/short form

- Key Responsibilities

1. Gaming Montages & Highlights
- edit valorant videos with perfect pacing, dramatic cuts, and spot-on Music Choice & audio sync. (Synced Shots , Synced & Smooth Transitions ,Build ups , masking/ transitions
-Long-Form Gaming Content : Daily Produced Long Form Videos (this will test your ability to maintain Video Quality Consistency over time and the ability to meet deadlines)


- Motion Graphics & Text Effects

- Use Adobe Premiere Pro & After Effects to add motion tracked text , subtitles , create animations to visualize a script instead of adding boring B-roll footage.
-[Choose gamer-appropriate fonts, set text anchor points perfectly, and animate text with smooth, professional transitions.

- Gamer Instinct & Culture

- plays games and has Gaming knowledge , and is able to research a game and understand it to cater to the niche of the client
- Stay on top of the latest releases,, streamers, youtubers , content creators, and viral gaming trends—and weave relevant references into your edits.

- Technical Polish

* Apply natural, consistent color grades that enhance game visuals without over-saturating.
* Balance audio levels: crisp game sound effects, clear commentary, and background music that matches the footage.

- Collaboration & Delivery

Work closely with me to see actual info: incorporate feedback, iterate quickly, and hit every deadline under pressure.

- Qualifications / Requirements

* Software Mastery: At least 3 years’ professional experience in **Adobe Premiere Pro** & **After Effects**.
* Gaming Passion: You live and breathe games—able to anticipate what our audience wants to see next.
* Detail-Oriented: Flawless typography, pixel-perfect text layers, and seamless motion graphic setups.
* Deadline-Driven: Thrive in a fast-paced environment; deliver every project on time (or early).
* Strong Communicator: Fluent in English (reading, writing, speaking) and responsive on Upgrade to see actual info during agreed hours.
* Growth Mindset: Always learning new techniques, plugins, and trends to level up your craft.
* Portfolio Required: Share reels or links showcasing your best gaming edits and montages. Shortlisted candidates will complete a paid trial.
- Content Ownership: All work is company-owned; editors will not be credited on published videos.

- What We Offer

* 36,591.10 Philippine peso or 650 usd
* Full-time remote schedule aligned with Philippine time zones (exact hours set upon hire).
- Career advancement: Clear path to Senior Editor, Team Lead, or percentage profit owning per video
* Community: Collaborate with a supportive international team of fellow gaming editors on Upgrade to see actual info.

- How to Apply

If you’re a detail-obsessed gaming editor who never misses a beat and always chasing perfection , apply now with:

1. Your resume/CV
2. Links to your gaming montage reels or highlight edits & other types of edits
3. A brief note on your favorite recent game and why it excites you



Qualified candidates will be invited to a short interview (Upgrade to see actual info) to further get to know the applicant and if passed to the next stage , complete a paid trial assignment. If you believe you have what it takes then we are eager to hear from you.

Unlock your full potential
